question: Which is the country of origin of the "Compas" dance music?
explanation: Haiti is the country of origin of the "Compas" dance music. Compas is a modern Meringue dance music of Haiti. The genre was popularized following the creation of Ensemble Aux Callebasses in (1955), which became Ensemble Nemours Jean-Baptiste In 1957. Compas is the main music of several countries such as Dominica and the French Antilles.
